Uses of Interface
uk.ac.liv.util.Resetable

Packages that use Resetable

Uses of Resetable in uk.ac.liv.ai.learning
 

Classes in uk.ac.liv.ai.learning that implement Resetable
 class DumbRandomLearner
          A learner that simply plays a random action on each iteration without any learning.
 class NPTRothErevLearner
           A modification of RothErev to address parameter degeneracy, and modified learning with 0-reward.
 class QLearner
           An implementation of the Q-learning algorithm, with epsilon-greedy exploration.
 class RothErevLearner
           A class implementing the Roth-Erev learning algorithm.
 class SlidingWindowLearner
          maintains a sliding window over the trained data series and use the average of data items falling into the window as the output learned.
 class StatelessQLearner
          A memory-less version of the Q-Learning algorithm.
 class WidrowHoffLearner
          An implementation of the Widrow-Hoff learning algorithm for 1-dimensional training sets.
 class WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum
           
 

Uses of Resetable in uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
 

Subinterfaces of Resetable in uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
 interface AdaptiveStrategy
           Strategies implementing this interface indicate that they are based on a learning algorithm.
 interface FixedQuantityStrategy
           Strategies implementing this interface indicate that they bid a constant quantity in each auction round.
 interface Strategy
           Classes implementing this interface define trading strategies for round-robin traders.
 interface TradingAgent
           Classes implementing this interface can trade in round-robin auctions, as implemented by the RoundRobinAuction class.
 interface ValuationPolicy
          A commodity valuation policy for RoundRobinTrader agents.
 

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.agent that implement Resetable
 class AbstractRandomValuer
           
 class AbstractStrategy
           An abstract implementation of the Strategy interface that provides skeleton functionality for making trading decisions.
 class AbstractTradingAgent
           An abstract class representing a simple agent trading in a round-robin auction.
 class AdaptiveStrategyImpl
           
 class BeatTheQuoteStrategy
           
 class BuyerIntervalValuer
           Buyers configured with this valuation policy will receive a unique private value from a common set of values starting at minValue and incrementing by step as each agent is assigned a valuation.
 class DailyRandomValuer
          A valuation policy in which we are allocated a new random valuation at the end of each day.
 class DiscreteLearnerStrategy
          A class representing a strategy in which we adapt our bids using a discrete learning algorithm.
 class DistinctDistributionValuer
           
 class EquilibriumPriceStrategy
          A strategy which will bid at the true equilibrium price, if profitable, or bid truthfully otherwise.
 class EstimatedEPStrategy
           
 class FixedPriceStrategy
           
 class FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
          An abstract implementation of FixedQuantityStrategy.
 class FixedValuer
          A valuation policy in which we maintain a fixed private valuation independent of time or auction.
 class GDLStrategy
           A modified implementation of the Gjerstad Dickhaut strategy.
 class GDQStrategy
           An implementation of the modified Gjerstad Dickhaut strategy in which quadratic, instead of cubic originally, functions are used to calculate the probability of any bid being accepted and bid to maximize expected profit.
 class GDStrategy
           An implementation of the Gjerstad Dickhaut strategy.
 class IntervalValuer
           Agents configured with this valuation policy will receive a unique private value from a common set of values starting at minValue and incrementing by step as each agent is assigned a valuation at agent setup time.
 class KaplanStrategy
           An implementation of Todd Kaplan's sniping strategy.
 class MarkupStrategyDecorator
          This strategy decorates a component strategy by bidding a fixed proportional markup over the price specified by the underlying component strategy.
 class MDPStrategy
           A trading strategy that uses an MDP learning algorithm, such as the Q-learning algorithm, to adapt its trading behaviour in successive auction rounds.
 class MixedStrategy
          A class representing a mixed strategy.
(package private)  class MockAuctioneer
           
(package private)  class MockMomentumStrategy
           
(package private)  class MockRandomScheduleValuer
           
 class MockStrategy
           
 class MockTrader
           
 class MomentumStrategy
           
 class PriestVanTolStrategy
           
 class ProportionalMarkupStrategy
          This strategy bids at the specified percentage markup over the agent's current valuation.
 class PureSimpleStrategy
           A trading strategy in which we bid a constant mark-up on the agent's private value.
 class RandomConstrainedStrategy
           A trading strategy that in which we bid a different random markup on our agent's private value in each auction round.
 class RandomScheduleValuer
          A valuation policy which specifies a randomly-generated series of valuations for each unit of commodity.
 class RandomUnconstrainedStrategy
           A trading strategy in which an agent bid regardless its private value.
 class RandomValuer
          A valuation policy in which we randomly determine our valuation across all auctions and all units at agent-initialisation time.
 class SellerIntervalValuer
           Sellers configured with this valuation policy will receive a unique private value from a common set of values starting at minValue and incrementing by step as each agent is assigned a valuation.
 class SimpleMomentumStrategy
           
 class StimuliResponseStrategy
           A trading strategy that uses a stimuli-response learning algorithm, such as the Roth-Erev algorithm, to adapt its trading behaviour in successive auction rounds by using the agent's profits in the last round as a reward signal.
(package private)  class TestLearnerStrategy
           
 class TruthTellingStrategy

Subinterfaces of Resetable in uk.ac.liv.auction.core

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.core that implement Resetable
 class AbstractAuctioneer
          An abstract class representing an auctioneer managing shouts in an auction.
 class AscendingAuctioneer
          Auctioneer for standard multi-unit english ascending auction.
 class AuctionImpl
          An abstract implementation of Auction that provides basic logging facilities.
 class ClearingHouseAuctioneer
          An auctioneer for a clearing house auction.
 class ContinuousDoubleAuctioneer
          An auctioneer for a double-auction with continuous clearing.
 class ContinuousDoubleAuctioneerEE
           An auctioneer for a double auction with continuous clearing and equlibrium price estimation.
 class ContinuousDoubleAuctioneerNoQueue
          An auctioneer for a k-double-auction with continuous clearing and no order queuing.
 class FourHeapShoutEngine
           This class provides auction shout management services using the 4-Heap algorithm.
 class GenericDoubleAuctioneer
           An modular auctioneer for a double auction.
 class McAfeeClearingHouseAuctioneer
          An implementation of the mechanism described in "A Dominant Strategy Double Auction" R.
 class NPricingPolicy
          A discriminatory pricing policy that uses the average of the last n pair of bid and ask prices leading to transactions as the clearing price.
 class PeriodicClearingHouseAuctioneer
          Deprecated.  
 class RandomClearingDoubleAuctioneer
          Deprecated.  
 class RandomRobinAuction
           A class representing an auction in which RoundRobinTraders can trade by placing shouts in a synchronous round-robin shedule.
 class RoundRobinAuction
          Deprecated.  
 class SealedShoutAuctioneer
           
 class ShoutStepAuction

Uses of Resetable in uk.ac.liv.auction.stats
 

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.stats that implement Resetable
 class AgentPayoffReport
          A report that lists the ratio of actual to theoretical profits of each agent group in the auction.
 class AuctionStateStats
           
 class CombiAuctionReport
           A report that combines several different reports.
 class ComplexityReport
           
 class DailyStatsReport
          A report that collects price statistics for each trading day.
 class DirectRevelationReport
          This class computes the hypothetical auction state when all agents bid at their private valuation, ie when all agents bid truthfully.
 class DynamicSurplusReport
           A report that keeps track of the surplus available to each agent in theoretical equilibrium.
 class EquilibriumReport
           A class to calculate the true equilibrium price and quantity ranges for a given auction.
 class GraphReport
           A report that logs data to a RePast graph sequence.
 class GroupPayoffReport
          A report that lists the ratio of actual to theoretical profits of each agent group in the auction.
 class HistoricalDataReport
           A report that keeps a historical record of the shouts in the market that lead to the last N transactions.
 class PayoffReport
           
 class PriceStatisticsReport
           A report that keeps cummulative statistics on bid prices, ask prices, transaction prices, and market quote prices.
 class ReportedSupplyAndDemandStats
          A class to calculate the supply and demand curves and write them to the specified DataWriters.
 class ReportVariableBoardUpdater
          A class updates values of major ReportVariables on ReportVariableBoard.
 class StrategyPayoffReport
          A report that lists the ratio of actual to theoretical profits of each strategy being played in the auction.
 class SupplyAndDemandStats
           
 class SurplusReport
          A report that calculates the actual surplus of buyers and sellers in the auction verses the theoretical surplus when trades occur at the equilibrium price.
 class TrueSupplyAndDemandStats
          A class to calculate the supply and demand curves and write them to the specified DataWriters.

Classes in uk.ac.liv.util that implement Resetable
 class CummulativeDistribution
           A utility class for cummulative tracking of stats for a series of doubles.
 class FixedLengthQueue
           A queue with fixed length, which can be useful when tracking a sliding window on a data series

          An distribution which keeps actual cases in memory as well as updating moments dynamically.
